channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- New User Email Set Up
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- New User Email Set Up

item.title: CVE-2022-1790|2024-08-03T00:16:59.968Z -- unknown -- new%20user%20email%20set%20up
item.description: The New User Email Set Up WordPress plugin through 0.5.2 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack
